name: resew
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to sew something again: Take the coat completely apart, remove the buttonholes, and resew the seams. I love cutting up clothes and resewing them to fit my own size and personality.
More examplesFewer examplesThe uniforms were cut rather too tight and many umpires had to have their trousers resewn.The finest kimonos were taken apart for cleaning, dried flat, then resewn.The famous garment worn by the model was a cashmere sweater cut up and resewn into a Union Jack.She would spend hours in her room sewing, unpicking, and re-sewing until she felt that the clothes were perfect.
